product_details.name: Mood Enhancing Paan for Men & Women
product_details.description:
The Nooky Mood Uplifting Paan is an aphrodisiac chocolate paan designed to enhance mood, energy, and intimacy between partners. Crafted with a blend of natural herbs and dark chocolate, it aims to create a delightful experience for couples.
Amazon India
+4
Cirkle Street
+4
Trynooky
+4

🌿 Key Ingredients & Benefits
Dark Chocolate: Releases endorphins, improving mood and arousal.

Maca Extract: Supports energy, blood flow, and healthy sexual function.

Velvet Bean (Kaunch Beej): Enhances sperm count and semen quality.

Ashwagandha: Reduces stress, enhances arousal, lubrication, and orgasm.

Shatavari Extract: Supports reproductive health and balances hormones.

Javitri (Mace): Promotes relaxation and enhances mood.

Caffeine: Boosts physical performance, endurance, and stamina.

Liboost Powder: Increases nitric oxide release, favoring arousal.
Cirkle Street

+1

+1

💑 How to Use
Consume one piece with your partner approximately 30 minutes before intimacy. The effects typically last between 1 to 3 hours, enhancing the overall experience. Regular use may lead to cumulative benefits over time.

📦 Packaging & Pricing
Pack of 2: ₹575 (MRP ₹698)

Pack of 4: ₹699 (MRP ₹698)

Special offers include ₹150 off on prepaid orders and additional discounts with coupon codes:

PAAN2: Extra ₹26 off on a pack of 2.

PAAN4: Extra ₹120 off on a pack of 4.
Cirkle Street

These offers are valid until May 31, 2025.

banner_details:
The banner features a bold and elegant aesthetic with a premium feel. A dynamic diagonal split creates visual interest between a luxurious black and deep maroon background. The top-left corner showcases two large, bold heading text layers (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) in a golden serif font, emphasizing passion and luxury. Below this, a smaller serif font subheading (`subheading`) in white adds clarity about the product type. A list-style description (`description`) in golden text highlights key benefits using bullet points. The bottom-left corner features the price (`price`) in large, bold golden digits, and a CTA button (`cta_background` and `cta`) in gold with dark bold text urging action. On the right side, a triangular product image (`product_image`) adds a focal point of brand identity.

Color Palette:
- Deep Maroon: #66001a
- Charcoal Black: #0b0b0b
- Gold: #e1cf8d
- White: #f7f7f7
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated color palette that includes deep teal (#004D43), luxurious gold (#D4A855), and subtle ivory accents (#F5F5F5). The deep teal dominates the background, evoking elegance and calmness, while the metallic gold typography and leaf design add a touch of opulence and sensuality, aligning well with the product's theme. The gold lines are cleanly integrated into the teal background, standing out without clashing, thanks to their sharp contrast and strategic placement. These colors harmonize beautifully, suggesting an exotic and premium feel. This palette is ideal for an advertisement banner that aims to convey intimacy, luxury, and allure.
